content: berries n cream materials  one ball athena by needlful yarns 50 gm 92 m  one ball malizia byestelle 50 gm 50 m  size 9mm crochet hook gauge one pattern repeat is 13 cm long one strand of each yarn worked together finished size 54 cm long 16 cm wide to work picot chain 3 single_crochet in third chain from hook chain 10 row 1 right side double_crochet in fourth chain from hook 3 skipped chs count as first double_crochet and in each chain across 8dc row 2 work picot turn double_crochet in first 3 double_crochet chain 2 skip next 2 double_crochet double_crochet in last 3 double_crochet 6dc row 3 chain 5 turn double_crochet in first 3 double_crochet 2 double_crochet in next chain 2 space double_crochet in last 3 double_crochet 8dc row 4 work picot turn double_crochet in first 3 double_crochet chain 2 skip next 2 double_crochet double_crochet in next 3 double_crochet chain 1 double_crochet ch1 6 times in next chain 5 space working in end of row slip st in st at base of last double_crochet on row 3 row 5 chain 1 turn single_crochet in first double_crochet chain 3 single_crochet in next double_crochet 5 times double_crochet in next 3 double_crochet 2 double_crochet in next chain 2 space double_crochet in last 3 double_crochet row 6 work picot turn double_crochet in first 3 double_crochet chain 2 skip next 2 double_crochet double_crochet in last 3 double_crochet leaving remaining 6 single_crochet unworked 6 double_crochet repeat row 3-6 four 4 more times last row chain 3 turn skip first double_crochet double_crochet in next 3 double_crochet 2 double_crochet in next chain 2 space double_crochet in last 3 double_crochet finish off sew in ends steam add button to center of first row enjoy monika stramaglia 2006 all rights reserved accept no copies bevwood@rogers com
